RequirementsÂ¶

Pyenty was built on top of the motor driver which was developed to be used with tornado web applications as well as pyenty. The automatic installation of tornado and motor, install all needed package to run tornado with a suitable structure for mongodb.

See Installation section.

You can also install all requirements to use pyenty just using motor pip install. See Motor Installation:

If you choose to install the packages one by one, check pyenty requirements:

  • Python 3.4 or later
  • Tornado 3.1 or later
  • Motor 0.3 or later
  • MongoDB
